patthana22.26:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo
patthana22.26:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana22.26:1.1_2: hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahetuñca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana22.26:1.1_3: nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.26:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu dhammo
patthana22.26:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho
patthana22.26:2.1_2: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Nahetu nanahetu ovattā, tīṇi mūlāni, ekavīsati
patthana22.26:2.1_3: pañhā kātabbā.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
